scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name passion3d-world
scripts.db:query:quotes: wrangler d1 execute passion3d-production --command='SELECT * FROM quotes ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10'
scripts.db:query:contacts: wrangler d1 execute passion3d-production --command='SELECT * FROM contacts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10'
scripts.secret:email: wrangler pages secret put EMAIL_API_KEY --project-name passion3d-world
scripts.secret:admin: wrangler pages secret put ADMIN_EMAIL --project-name passion3d-world
